tasks.title: fix eclair ui bugs
tasks.description:
Eclair has some bugs

- full graph: tool tip always appears to the right on hover, soimetimes off screen
- overview page: lists everything in the card - card is huge. Overview should be fixed size with limited number of items and indicator there are more
- Flows and full graph do not show external links. This was a new feature that was added recently that needs to be added to eclair. External links should appear in flows, domain map (as domains), and full graph, and for events
- events: no link to target handler, no explanation of where the event is published, not displaying the payload
- entities: clicking on maethod doesn't show the business rules + state transitions show commas draft,active
